description: Definitely it's amazing tool for db routines. Lot of built-in features, plugin-based envronment, modern and customizable UI.

description: Good GUI for the most popular SQL and (no)SQL databases. Greate scope of needed functions for complete and comfortable work with databases. Only one UX trouble that I met was buckup/restore because for this process will be good to have some process indication and state control.
summary: Good GUI for the SQL and noSQL DB
